howToUse.title: How to Translate Subtitles in 3 Easy Steps
howToUse.subtitle: Translate your SRT files in under a minute

step1.title: Upload Your SRT File
step1.description: Drag and drop your subtitle file, or click to browse. We support standard .srt format files up to 5MB. Your file will be instantly analyzed and ready for translation.

step2.title: Select Languages
step2.description: Choose your source language (the language your subtitles are currently in) and target language (the language you want to translate to). We support 50+ languages including all major languages worldwide.

step3.title: Download Translated Subtitles
step3.description: Click translate and watch as AI processes each subtitle line. In minutes, download your translated SRT file - ready to use with any video player or editing software.

formats.title: Choose Your Output Format
formats.mono: Single Language - Get only the translated subtitles
formats.both: Both Formats - Download two separate files

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our subtitle translator

q1.question: What is an SRT file and how do I get one?
q1.answer: An SRT (SubRip Subtitle) file is a plain text file containing subtitle information including timing and text. You can extract SRT files from videos using tools like VLC Media Player, download them from subtitle websites, or create them with subtitle editing software. Our translator works with standard SRT format files.

q2.question: How accurate are the AI translations?
q2.answer: Our AI-powered translator uses advanced language models (GPT-3.5-turbo) that understand context, idioms, and cultural nuances. While machine translation continues to improve, accuracy is typically 85-95% for common language pairs. For professional use, we recommend reviewing translations, especially for technical or creative content.

q3.question: Can I translate subtitles for YouTube videos?
q3.answer: Yes! Our tool is perfect for YouTube creators. Simply download the SRT subtitle file from YouTube (or create one), translate it using our tool, then upload the translated SRT file back to YouTube. This helps you reach international audiences and grow your channel globally.

q4.question: Is there a limit on file size or number of subtitles?
q4.answer: Files must be under 5MB, which typically includes several thousand subtitle lines - more than enough for a full-length movie. You can translate up to 50 files per day for free. If you need higher limits for commercial use, please contact us.

q5.question: What's the difference between mono and bilingual subtitles?
q5.answer: Mono (single language) subtitles contain only the translated text - perfect for viewers who just need to understand the content. Bilingual subtitles show both original and translated text, ideal for language learners who want to compare translations or viewers who understand both languages.

q6.question: Do you store or share my subtitle files?
q6.answer: No, we take privacy seriously. Your files are processed in real-time and automatically deleted immediately after translation. We never store, analyze, or share your content. Your subtitles and videos remain completely private and secure.

contentCreators.title: Content Creators & YouTubers
contentCreators.description: Reach English-speaking audiences worldwide by translating your video content into English subtitles. Perfect for expanding your international viewership and growing your channel with professional English SRT files.

educators.description: Make educational content accessible to English-speaking students globally. Translate lectures, tutorials, and courses into accurate English subtitles that enhance learning comprehension and engagement.

businesses.title: Businesses & Marketing
businesses.description: Expand your market reach by converting marketing videos, product demos, and corporate training materials into English subtitles. Essential for companies targeting English-speaking markets worldwide.

filmmakers.title: Filmmakers & Media
filmmakers.description: Prepare your films, documentaries, and media content for international festivals and English-speaking distributors. Professional English subtitle translation maintains artistic nuance and cultural context.

researchers.title: Researchers & Academics
researchers.description: Share your research presentations and academic content with the global English-speaking scholarly community. Translate conference talks and educational materials into precise English subtitles.

entertainment.title: Entertainment & Streaming
entertainment.description: Localize foreign language shows, movies, and entertainment content for English-speaking viewers. Create professional English SRT files that capture dialogue nuance and cultural references.

linguisticExplanation.title: The Challenge of Translating to English
linguisticExplanation.subtitle: Understanding linguistic complexities and how our AI solves them
linguisticExplanation.intro: English is the world's most widely spoken second language, making English subtitles essential for global content. However, translating from diverse languages into English presents unique linguistic challenges that require sophisticated solutions.

wordOrder.title: Word Order & Syntax
wordOrder.description: Many languages (Japanese, Korean, Turkish) use Subject-Object-Verb order, while English uses Subject-Verb-Object. Languages like Arabic read right-to-left. Our AI restructures sentences naturally while preserving meaning, ensuring English subtitles flow smoothly.

idioms.title: Idioms & Cultural Expressions
idioms.description: Direct translation of idioms often fails. Chinese '马马虎虎' (so-so), Spanish 'estar en la luna' (daydreaming), or French 'avoir le cafard' (feeling blue) need cultural adaptation. Our English subtitle translator recognizes idioms and provides natural English equivalents.

formality.title: Formality & Politeness Levels
formality.description: Languages like Japanese, Korean, and Thai have complex honorific systems that don't directly map to English. Our AI interprets context to choose appropriate English registers (formal, casual, professional) for natural English subtitles.

tense.title: Tense & Aspect Systems
tense.description: Mandarin Chinese lacks grammatical tense, while Arabic has only past and present. Slavic languages have complex aspectual distinctions. Our English SRT translator infers temporal context to select accurate English tenses from dialogue context.

timing.title: Text Length & Timing
timing.description: German compounds and Finnish agglutination create long words. Asian languages express concepts with fewer characters. Our English subtitle translator balances accuracy with readability, ensuring English SRT timing matches video pacing.

contextual.title: Context-Dependent Meaning
contextual.description: Many languages rely heavily on context - Japanese omits subjects, Arabic roots carry multiple meanings. Our AI analyzes surrounding dialogue to determine precise meanings for accurate English subtitle translation.

advantages.title: Our English Subtitle Translator Advantages
advantages.subtitle: Advanced AI technology specifically optimized for English subtitle translation

contextAware.title: Context-Aware Translation
contextAware.description: Unlike basic translators, our AI analyzes entire subtitle sequences, not isolated lines. This produces coherent English subtitles that maintain narrative flow and character voice consistency throughout your video.

culturalAdaptation.title: Cultural Localization
culturalAdaptation.description: Automatically adapts cultural references, measurements, and expressions for English-speaking audiences. Converts idioms, proverbs, and cultural concepts into natural English equivalents that resonate with viewers.

naturalFlow.title: Natural English Flow
naturalFlow.description: Our English SRT generator doesn't produce literal translations. It creates natural, readable English subtitles that sound authentic to native speakers, avoiding awkward phrasing common in machine translation.

technicalAccuracy.title: Technical & Domain Precision
technicalAccuracy.description: Trained on diverse content types - from medical terminology to gaming slang. Whether translating technical documentation or casual vlogs, our English subtitle translator maintains domain-appropriate vocabulary and terminology.

timing.title: Optimized Subtitle Timing
timing.description: Automatically adjusts English subtitle length for optimal readability while maintaining synchronization. Our system ensures English SRT files display long enough to read comfortably without disrupting viewer experience.

quality.title: Consistent Quality
quality.description: Delivers professional-grade English subtitle translation consistently across all 50+ source languages. Whether translating from Japanese, Spanish, or Arabic, expect the same high-quality English subtitles every time.
